name: overtired
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely tired, often so that you can not sleep
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
in need of sleep or resttiredI'm so tired, I need a nap.exhaustedI'm too exhausted to take the dog for a walk.worn outI was completely worn out.burned outHe was completely burned out after a full week of performances.drainedI'd worked a twelve-hour day and was absolutely drained.wiped outI've been up since 4 a.m. and am just wiped out.
